name: DayEnd
description:
Someone has released a biological weapon accidentally and it turned the human race into zombies. The world has become corrupted and almost the entire human population has been infected by this biological weapon and only a few people have survived and have to survive. Not only the main modes are available, you can also play wave mode and survive from zombie attacks and score as much as possible.

FEATURE

- There is a single player mode

- There is a Waves mode

- There are various types of weapons

- There are 4 maps

- 5 types of Zombies

Stay tuned to get updates in this game

PLS Support me by buying this game ,Thanks.
